about_the_game:
"Balkanija" is a unique blend of adventure, quests, and economic strategy that immerses you in an exciting world on the edge of Europe. The action takes place in the colorful capital of one of the Balkan countries, where life is bustling in a Romani neighborhood filled with vibrant characters and unexpected twists.

You will take control of the fates of the main characters — Hanko and his wife Zoe. Each new day will bring new opportunities, introduce you to interesting people, and present tasks that will make you think about the true values of life.

In this world, even the most mundane tasks can turn into thrilling adventures, but there will also be serious challenges. You will need to maintain a balance between the everyday lives of your heroes and the challenges posed by economic hardships and criminal threats.

Interact with other characters, manage resources and time, and make important decisions — every action you take will have consequences for the fate of Hanko and Zoe. Will you find a way to survive and find happiness in this complex yet captivating world?

Key Features:

  • Introduction of New Heroes: As the story progresses, you will encounter new characters who can join your team. Each hero has unique skills and can perform various tasks.
  • Quests: The gameplay is enriched with a quest system that helps you explore the diverse capabilities of your characters and unlock their potential.
  • Economy: The economy is an integral part of the game. Earn money through various means and use it to develop your business, support your family, and engage in gambling activities.
